name: Earth Tones Natural Thick Hemp Bracelet
description:
The most comfortable hemp bracelet you will ever wear!

Made using the switchback macrame knot, these hemp bracelets are extremely unique in their look and are sure to attract attention. This colorful bracelet in particular was made using dark brown, light brown and natural hemp cord.

These bracelets have a ceramic washer bead and loop for closure, making them secure enough to stay on but easy enough to remove when needed.

On average, the quality of these hemp bracelets will last up to 2 months if worn every day without being taken off. It is recommended to remove these before showering, washing dishes or swimming to make these bracelets last longer - if taken care of well, they can last for over a year.

******************************
SIZES (General guidelines)
******************************

Infants & Toddlers: 3 - 4 inches
Petite: 5.5 inches
Small: 6.5 inches
Average: 7.5 inches
Large: 8 inches

** To measure your size accurately, take a piece of string and wrap it around your wrist. Cut the string and measure the length of the string with a ruler. This will give you your exact wrist size for a better fit! **

*****************
All sizes above 8 inches are subject to a charge of $0.25 per 1/2 inch. These are to accommodate those who want to wear the bracelet as an anklet.
*****************
